t = int(raw_input())
while t > 0:
	n = int(raw_input())
	r = n%7
	q = (n-r)/7
	if r == 0 or r == 4:
		ans = 7*q
	elif r == 1 or r == 5:
		if (q-1) >= 0:
			ans = 7*(q-1)
		else:
			ans = -1
	elif r==2 or r == 6:
		if (q-2) >= 0:
			ans = 7*(q-2)
		else:
			ans = -1
	elif r==3:
		if (q-3) >= 0:
			ans = 7*(q-3)
		else:
			ans = -1
	
	print ans
	t -= 1
